body: Hi guys I recently got promoted to Media and I am looking for teams that can scrim today because I want to try some new things in my streams, if you guys want me to livestream and comentate your match just let me now!
body_tagged: Hi guys I recently got promoted to Media and I am looking for teams that can scrim today because I want to try some new things in my streams, if you guys want me to livestream and comentate your match just let me now!
title: Livestreaming Scrimmages!

replies.body: Could always commentate public matches too :P. It's what I do to test out settings and stuff
